definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: Creates loose couplings between the client components and the services they use.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端组件和它们所使用的服务之间建立了松耦合。

sentences.english: Eric Schenk had the idea of adding something to the client's initial sequence number.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克申的想法增加一些客户端的初始序列号。

sentences.english: Conception client software resides "on" the router, and a camera.
sentences.chinese: 动态域名客户端软件驻留在一个路由器，摄像头。

sentences.english: I use this client-side implementation throughout my discussion.
sentences.chinese: 在我的讨论中，我将使用这个客户端实现。

sentences.english: It establishes the foundation for the next generation of client software.
sentences.chinese: 它们为下一代客户端软件奠定了基础。

sentences.english: NET Remoting - How to do a callback to all connected clients?
sentences.chinese: 如何做一个回调到所有连接的客户端？

sentences.english: The integration test client lets you import that data into a business object.
sentences.chinese: 使用集成测试客户端可以将该数据导入到业务对象。

sentences.english: Any data that are sent to a game client can be accessed or modified.
sentences.chinese: 任何发送到游戏客户端的数据都可以访问或修改。

sentences.english: This sounds like a wonderful application for client-side state mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 这听起来应该是客户端状态机制的任务。

sentences.english: This can be done without having to modify the client applications that use the user-side interfaces for dictionary services.
sentences.chinese: 不需要修改使用词典服务客户端接口的客户应用程序。

sentences.english: FileZilla: Open source FTP client and server.
sentences.chinese: 开源的FTP客户端及服务器软件。

sentences.english: The client layer controls the transaction scope.
sentences.chinese: 客户端层控制事务作用域。

sentences.english: Implementing the logic in the client application has a negative impact on performance.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端应用中实现这一逻辑将对性能造成负面影响。

sentences.english: Do you need to have more than one client type access shared data?
sentences.chinese: 你需要不止一种类型的客户端访问共享数据吗？

sentences.english: Fixed server hitching when client is kicked for inactivity.
sentences.chinese: 当客户端固定服务器拴马是闲置拳打脚踢。

sentences.english: Old services would never return the new fields, though new services might.
sentences.chinese: 旧客户端永远不返回新字段，而新服务可以。

definition: online version of the People's Daily, 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4]
